item.title: Starting with Hugo, and troubleshooting the tutorial
item.description: I tried to set up my own GitHub blog using jekyll and got stuck. I left it alone. Then jumped on the opportunity to have a guided session wokring in it with the Tech Blogger’s community of “Baot IL” I wrote this post as part of setting up the new blog,and also to document what I did, where I got stuck and how I overcame it The tutorial I followed the step in this tutorial:

item.title: Welcome to my TechStuff blog
